snippet: For Cassie Dagostino, a senior at Brooklyn Technical High school, has a mother, father, stepmother, stepfather, two half-siblings and five stepsiblings, it can be difficult to apply for financial aid.
abstract: For Cassie Dagostino, a senior at Brooklyn Technical High school, has a mother, father, stepmother, stepfather, two half-siblings and five stepsiblings, it can be difficult to apply for financial aid.

headline.main: Accepted and Relieved, Until Thoughts Turn to Financial Aid
